articles.author: Lijee Philip and Pranav Balakrishnan
articles.title: Rising fuel costs, less sops forcing most cabbies out
articles.description: Commuters are, in short, getting a raw deal, as a steep increase in the price of CNG and slashing of incentives by cab aggregators such as Ola and Uber have made it unviable for drivers to ply, experts said.
articles.content: Mumbai | Bengaluru: Frequent users of cabs are facing trip cancellations, higher fares and longer wait times. They are also dealing with drivers refusing to go to certain locations or demanding extra… [+4765 chars]

articles.description: पाकिस्तान के पूर्व पीएम इमरान खान ने भारत में पेट्रोल-डीजल के दामों में की गई कटौती की तारीफ की है। इमरान खान ने कहा कि  भारत की स्वतंत्र विदेश नीति है। वह अमेरिका के दवाब में नहीं आया और रूस से तेल कर खरीद कर अपने नागरिकों को राहत दी है।

articles.title: लाखा बंजारा झील में अचानक मिलने लगे लोहे के रॉड इसके रहस्यमय इतिहास को लेकर शुरू हो गईं चर्चाएं
articles.description: एमपी के सागर में स्थित लाखा बंजारा की झील से शनिवार को अचानक लोहे के गोले निकलने लगे। ये गोले कब और कहां से आए, इसको लेकर तमाम कयास लगाए जा रहे हैं। झील पर पुलिस का पहरा लगा दिया गया है, लेकिन इस बीच इसके रहस्यमय इतिहास की चर्चाएं भी जोर-शोर से होने लगी हैं।

articles.description: पाकिस्तान के पंजाब प्रांत में पाकिस्तानी मूल की स्पेनिश बहनों को उन्हीं के चाचा ने हत्या कर दी। स्थानीय मीडिया ने बताया कि वे स्पेन में अपने पतियों को साथ रखने के लिए उनके लिए वीजा प्राप्त करने में विफल रही थीं। दोनों बहनों की उम्र 21 और 23 वर्ष बताई गई है।

articles.title: BMC gives Ranas a week to alter flat
articles.description: Rejecting the reply submitted by MLA Ravi Rana and his Amravati MP wife Navneet Rana about alleged irregularities in their Khar flat, the BMC on Friday passed a speaking order stating that the unauthorised works pointed out by it should be removed in seven da…
articles.content: Remove illegal works in flat in week or we will: BMC to Ranas

articles.author: Shrinivasa M
articles.title: 30 kids/section cap in govt schools lifted
articles.description: The department of public instruction (DPI) has removed the cap of 30 students per section. This follows the demand for admission to English-medium sections in government schools.
articles.content: 30 kids/section cap in Karnataka government schools lifted

articles.author: Malathy Iyer
articles.title: BMC using AI to spot cases early in TB battle
articles.description: When Covid-19- the newest public health emergency-hit Mumbai, the BMC did more than roping in contract doctors, buying medicines and setting up field hospitals. It used the modern medical tool of artificial intelligence (AI) to track the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
articles.content: Mumbai: BMC banks on AI to detect tuberculosis faster, screens X-rays in 3 minutes

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Techie convicted of killing wife sees sentence reduced from life to 10 years
articles.description: Holding that the incident occurred on account of "sudden provocation and without any premeditation", the high court modified the sentence of life imprisonment imposed on a software engineer for murdering his wife.
articles.content: Bengaluru: Techie convicted of killing wife sees sentence reduced from life to 10 years

articles.author: Manthank Mehta
articles.title: BEST gets first woman driver
articles.description: Soon, Mulund resident Laxmi Jadhav (41) will have the distinction of becoming the first woman driver to operate a BEST bus ever since the transport body commenced operations 96 years ago in 1926.
articles.content: Mumbai: First female driver to steer BEST buses soon, 2 more hired

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Modi to attend Int'l Yoga Day event in Mysuru
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will attend International Day of Yoga (IDY) celebrations in Mysuru on June 21.
